TopicTitle: Led light indicators in the fuel cells

Articles.Content:
This is rather simple. Right now, if you want to know if the fuel cell is running, you have to right click on it.

So, how about adding a simple light to the model so, for example:

Light off: fuel cell is off

Red light: fuel cell is on and producing electricity

Blue light: fuel cell is on, but the batteries are near full/rtgs or solar panels are producing enough power for the current consumption, so the cell isn't producing electricity

Blinking red light: low on fuel.

That way, the player can see at a glance and in an immersible way if the cells are on/off/expending fuel

I like it. Except, low fuel blinking other color that shows status. So dark=off, green=on making power, blue= on standby, blinking green= on making power + low fuel, blinking blue = on standby + low fuel.

Well, I would rather like colors that are similar to MechJeb's indicators. 

None - off

Green - Status:operational

Red - Status: Oxidizer deprived

 Status:Liquid fuel deprived

 Status:Batteries recharged

An alert for low fuel? I have no idea for that.

People have so many problems with the fuel cell. They should be fixed.
